get by ID
response.body:
{
    "id": "QTjMlQ_ap",
    "title": "test",
    "body": "You want to identify which tasks in the planned learning activity incorporate the use of the computer lab.\nWhich task should you identify?\nThis item is part of a case study. To view the case study information, click on the Case Study button below.",
    "options": [
        "The students must hang the posters in the entrance hall of the school.",
        "The students must assemble the images on a wall poster.",
        "The students must select and edit  digital images that illustrate the theme or the event.",
        " The students must split into small groups and each group must identify a theme or a historical event."
    ],
    "answers": [
        2
    ],
    "categoryId": "TEST_01"
}
